title: Can my food packed at GJBC?
content: The title says it all, I want to get me food packed from now on and like eat at my peace, can I get it packed at the GJBC cafeteria?

comments.body: Idk try getting a box or something, Ithink they'd just fill it and give

Don't even eat food at the gjbc food court. Unless you like a little extra cockroach protein from time to time. 

Eat in the south thing, or the cafe style thing. Never the fuck at food court
Nah...but you can take the plate elsewhere. Just don't forget to bring it back
